Monster farm on iphone?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: My Monster Rancher Archive (Andriod): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Monster farm on iphone?
By Summit_trainer on Sunday, February 26, 2012 - 06:13 pm:

A friend who does not play said she saw something monster
farm in the iPhone apps... Anyone know if there is any
relation?

By Lisa Shock on Sunday, February 26, 2012 - 10:56 pm:

That's not related. Some other company started a game with that name. Which is ironic because Tecmo couldn't get permission for the name in the US because there was a short-lived TV show with that name years ago. It never would have been called Monster Rancher in the first place if the creators of THIS show hadn't insisted they change it.

By Shen the Keeper on Monday, December 10, 2012 - 12:39 pm:

My Monster Rancher is available on the iPhone now and it works on my wife's iPhone 5. It did not work on my iPhone 2. :P

However I'm playing it now on my Samsung Galaxy S3.

Well not RIGHT now. I'm at work. Boo. But I have to pay for cell phone bills.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, December 10, 2012 - 08:20 pm:

Thanks fro the update!

By MrPenguinRox on Friday, December 14, 2012 - 03:41 pm:

Confirming the release of My Monster Rancher on the Iphone 3GS, 4, 4S, and 5 models. I am using a 4S and have the game. It was released on the IOS platform on July 10th, 2012.

Here is the link to the app: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/my-monster-rancher/id521870986?mt=8
